title: Oceanic Artathon Final Results - Sponsored by SMASH! and Wacom

replies.body: Holy shit-- thank you so much everyone! This was honestly so unexpected - the last few weeks produced some absolutely incredible entries and many times I felt I was easily outclassed in both imagination and execution. Thank you to everyone who voted and to the judging panel -- it was a fantastic competition and I'm so glad to be part of this community <3 !!
Congrats Neurolysis, Loved your style.
Thanks McKayn! Likewise - loved your humour :) always a joy seeing your entries.
Congrats to the winners and well done to everyone who entered! This was fun, would definitely enter in another Riot art competition!

At the risk of repeating myself - holy crap you guys are amazing, seriously. I don't even know where to start with the sheer quantity of gorgeous art everyone has created! Congratulations to the winners but also a huge thank you and WOW to everyone else who entered. <3

There are suddenly a lot of very familiar-looking desktop wallpapers around the office, that's for sure!
Hi Achenar, just wondering when are we to receive our RP? I've still not gotten it from the 3rd round results ^^

Thank you to everyone that voted for my entries through the rounds, I really did try my hardest but sadly it wasn't enough in the end. This is my last time entering these contests, thanks for the good times.

Congratulations to everyone who entered this contest! What an astounding show of talent: from Ahh McKayn's amazing Illaoi rising from the waters to unleash an angry god, to the tranquil meditation of Karma by the water thanks to Stylus. That very cute Kled charging into battle from CrimsonCheez got me where it counts and a dreamy MF bobbing along the waters of Bilgewater by Wacalac is so calming to look at. You're all so damn talented, thanks for the amazing art!
BOOOOOOO!! Ahh McKayn should of placed 3rd AT LEAST. So disappointing...
Ummm.... anyone from top 10 got their 2000rp from Round 3 yet?
I just got my 2k for the final round, but if I have read this right we are also getting another 2k for being top 10 overall?

> [{quoted}](name=Chikorita,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=Imx6vhZA,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2018-07-02T08:13:39.238+0000)
>
> I just got my 2k for the final round, but if I have read this right we are also getting another 2k for being top 10 overall?

Not me, I didn't make it to top 10 for the first round.
You're below me on the list at the bottom of this board so I think you're still in the top 10 overall <:
Hey guys, sorry for the slow response on this! You should definitely have received a total 4k - but I think I know what's happened! Will follow it up today and get this sorted for you.
I got my 2nd lot of RP today, thank you lots for everything you do Achenar!

I just want to say, i put a lot of time and effort into both this and my swain entry in the last competition and was pretty shattered to see I didnt make top three, but seeing people comment and support my stuff is super reassurring so I just wanted to put forward a big thank you to everyone posting saying they think i shouldve won, you guys are awesome and it helps me regain a lot of motivation so again thank you all, and thanks to all the riot crew aswell for hosting this.

I understand how you feel, I sadly don't understand what the judges really want and I stress myself out too much trying to do something amazing when we don't even get any feedback as to why it wasn't good enough. I think the top 10 overall should at least get that after 3 months of really hard work. 
I mean they aren't obliged to give feedback but yea. 

I really loved your entries by the way.

Beautiful art done for this huge contest (being 3 entries) by all participants but I was definitely taken away by these results. There were a couple of entries that I believed should have been in the top 3 but each to there own. Biggest surprise to me really is the guy that got his artwork displayed on the league of legends oceanic client didn't make it to top 3. For such a large competition I just wanted to ask if the "judges panel" had artistic credibility, in hope that the artists that spent 3 months and didn't win, know that it wasn't from a "panel" of employees that put their hands up. Take this comment as you will, this is just my own personal thought.

Hey, from the competition briefing, it mentions that the panel includes riot team members here: 
"Once all voting is complete, we will use the rankings for all three stages to collate a Top 10 shortlist. An internal panel of Rioters – including Riot Earp from our Champion Art Team – will identify the final winners from these top 10."
Went full throttle on this one, i guess I have to blow up my engine for the next one.  Can we have another Duel Art Contest for the God Skins series or the good guys vs Darkin champions?
